original_definition: 'throughput' means the total annual quantity of petrol unloaded from mobile containers into a service station.
generated_definition: 'throughput' means its actual or intended throughput is greater than 100 m3/year and it is situated under permanent living quarters or working areas. or its actual or intended throughput is greater than 500 m3/year.
